content.text: Match ends, Real Madrid 3, Chelsea 1.
Second Half ends, Real Madrid 3, Chelsea 1.
Offside, Real Madrid. Cristiano Ronaldo tries a through ball, but Álvaro Morata is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Ángel Di María (Real Madrid) left footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Nacho with a cross.
Attempt missed. Álvaro Morata (Real Madrid) right footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Cristiano Ronaldo.
Attempt saved. Casemiro (Real Madrid) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Álvaro Morata.

Foul by Nacho (Real Madrid).
